original_title: Omen : Live at the Country Club, Los Angeles, September 1984
overview: Opening for Slayer at The Country Club in Reseda, CA on 1st of September 1984. Sadly, J.D. Kimball, the singer passed away on October 3, 2003 due to complications from cancer.
title: Omen : Live at the Country Club, Los Angeles, September 1984
